About.metaTitle: About us - Cultural agenda of Catalonia | Esdeveniments.cat
About.metaDescription: Meet the team behind Esdeveniments.cat, the collaborative agenda of concerts, exhibitions, theatre and cultural activities in Catalonia. Free citizen initiative.
About.schemaDescription: Meet the Esdeveniments.cat team and the mission behind the collaborative cultural agenda of Catalonia.
About.heading: Who are we?
About.paragraph1: Esdeveniments.cat is a citizen initiative to easily and quickly see all the cultural events happening in Catalonia.
About.paragraph2: The agenda is collaborative, and anyone organizing a cultural event can publish it <publish>here</publish> on their own.
About.paragraph3: You can follow the cultural agenda on this website or follow us on social networks:
About.contactBody: For partnerships, press, or questions, email us.

TermsOfService.metaDescription: Terms of use for the Esdeveniments.cat website. Review the rules, responsibilities and rights regarding the content of the cultural agenda of Catalonia.
TermsOfService.heading: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.introBody: By accessing and using Esdeveniments.cat (hereinafter, the "Site"), you agree to comply with these terms of service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, do not use the Site.
TermsOfService.descriptionBody: Esdeveniments.cat is a free collaborative platform that aggregates and displays cultural events in Catalonia. The service includes event viewing, user event publishing, and search and filtering features.
TermsOfService.userContentBody: Users who publish events on the Site are solely responsible for the truthfulness, accuracy and legality of the published content. We reserve the right to remove any content we deem inappropriate, false or that violates third-party rights.
TermsOfService.intellectualPropertyBody: All original content on the Site (design, code, logos, original texts) is the property of Esdeveniments.cat. Event images and descriptions belong to their respective organizers.
TermsOfService.disclaimerBody: Esdeveniments.cat acts as a cultural information aggregator. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness or timeliness of event information. We are not responsible for changes, cancellations or errors in events published by third parties.
TermsOfService.thirdPartyBody: The Site may contain links to third-party websites. We have no control over the content or privacy practices of these sites and accept no responsibility for them.
TermsOfService.modificationsBody: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect upon publication on the Site. Continued use of the Site constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.
TermsOfService.contactBody: For any questions related to these terms, you can contact us at:

PrivacyPolicy.metaDescription: Privacy policy of Esdeveniments.cat. Information about the collection, use and protection of your personal data on the cultural agenda of Catalonia.
PrivacyPolicy.heading: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.introBody: At Esdeveniments.cat (hereinafter, the "Site") we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy describes what data we collect, how we use it and what your rights are.
PrivacyPolicy.dataCollectedBody: We collect the following categories of data:
PrivacyPolicy.dataAnalytics: Analytics data: anonymous information about the use of the Site through Google Analytics (pages visited, visit duration, device, country of origin).
PrivacyPolicy.dataCookies: Cookies: technical cookies necessary for the Site to function and analytics cookies to improve the service.
PrivacyPolicy.dataVisitor: Visitor identifier: an anonymous identifier stored in a cookie to count visits to events.
PrivacyPolicy.dataEvents: Event data: when you publish an event, we collect the information provided (title, description, location, dates, images).
PrivacyPolicy.purposeBody: We use the collected data to:
PrivacyPolicy.purposeImprove: Improve the operation and experience of the Site.
PrivacyPolicy.purposeAnalytics: Analyse the use of the Site in an aggregated and anonymous manner.
PrivacyPolicy.thirdPartyBody: We use the following third-party services that may process data:
PrivacyPolicy.thirdPartySentry: Sentry: error monitoring to improve Site stability.
PrivacyPolicy.thirdPartyNote: Each third-party service operates under its own privacy policies.
PrivacyPolicy.cookiesBody: We use essential technical cookies for the Site to function and analytics cookies. You can configure your browser to reject cookies, although some features may be affected.
PrivacyPolicy.retentionBody: Analytics data is retained according to standard Google Analytics periods. Published event data is retained while the event is relevant or until the organizer requests its deletion.
PrivacyPolicy.rightsBody: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to:
PrivacyPolicy.rightsDelete: Request the deletion of your data.
PrivacyPolicy.rightsPortability: Request the portability of your data.
PrivacyPolicy.rightsObject: Object to the processing of your data.
PrivacyPolicy.securityBody: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration or destruction.
PrivacyPolicy.changesBody: We may update this policy periodically. Any changes will be published on this page with the corresponding update date.
PrivacyPolicy.contactBody: To exercise your rights or for any privacy-related queries, contact us at:

useLocation.regionNotice: You've selected a county. Counties don't have a specific geographic point, so the distance filter can't be used. To use it, select a specific town or your location. You can still filter by date and categories to refine results.

SitemapTown.aboutBody: This archive contains a compilation of cultural events in {town} organized chronologically. Each month includes theatre, music, art, festivals, and other cultural activities.
SitemapTown.quickNavBody: Use the links to jump directly to a specific month. The most recent years appear first for easier browsing.

faq.moreInfoQ: Where can I find more information?
faq.moreInfoA: You can check all the details on the official event page.

Calendar.moreInfoHtml: More information: Esdeveniments.cat

ListPageFaq.title: Frequently asked questions
ListPageFaq.a1: In {capitalizedContext} you'll find concerts, fairs, family activities, and cultural plans updated daily.
ListPageFaq.a2: Yes. Use search, category filters, and distance to discover free activities {contextInline}.
ListPageFaq.a3: Select the "{categoryName}" category to highlight these events {contextInline} and save the agenda to check it often.

meta.title: Sponsor Your Town | Esdeveniments.cat
meta.description: Your business, featured on your town's events page. Exclusive space with no competitors.

hero.title: Show up when they search what to do in your town
hero.subtitle: Every day, people in your area check the events page to decide where to go. An exclusive space for your business, with zero competitors.
hero.stats: One advertiser per town ¬∑ From ‚Ç¨0.50/day ¬∑ Satisfaction guarantee

targeted.title: People ready to go out
targeted.description: You appear when they search what to do in their town. You reach people who already want to go out and are looking for plans.

affordable.title: Less than ‚Ç¨1 a day per town
affordable.description: A local Google ad costs ‚Ç¨50+/month and appears next to your competitors. Here, from ‚Ç¨0.50/day and the entire space is yours.

visibility.title: Only one ad per town
visibility.description: All the ad space is for your business. No competitor appears next to you. When they search what to do, they see you.

pricing.title: Simple and transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: No commitments or auto-renewals. Not satisfied within 7 days? Full refund.
pricing.guarantee: 7-day satisfaction guarantee ¬∑ No auto-renewal ¬∑ Secure payment with Stripe

7days.name: 7 days
7days.description: Perfect for long weekends or holiday periods

30days.name: 30 days
30days.description: Maximum visibility for your local business

step1.title: Choose where to appear
step1.description: Select the town/region and the duration you need

step2.title: Complete checkout
step2.description: Enter your business details and pay securely with Stripe

step3.title: Upload your banner image
step3.description: After payment, you can upload your ad image

step4.title: We review and activate
step4.description: Within 24 business hours you'll appear on the town or region page you chose

faq1.question: What size should the image be?
faq1.answer: Optimal size: 728√ó150px (5:1 ratio) for best quality. Minimum size: 400√ó80px (works well, but less sharp on large screens). Tall or square images will appear smaller with empty space on the sides.

faq2.question: Can I choose the town or region?
faq2.answer: Yes! You choose it before paying, so you know exactly where your ad will appear.

faq3.question: When is my ad activated?
faq3.answer: Within 24 business hours after receiving payment and after you've uploaded the image.

faq4.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
faq4.answer: We offer a satisfaction guarantee: if within the first 7 days you're not happy with the service, we'll refund your payment. You can also contact us to modify the image or link at no extra cost.

contact.title: Have questions?
contact.description: Write to us and we'll help you choose the best option for your business.

placeSelector.label: Where do you want your ad to appear?
placeSelector.placeholder: Search for a town or region...
placeSelector.occupiedWithDays: Occupied ¬∑ {count, plural, one {# day left} other {# days left}}

checkout.successSubtitle: Final step: upload your banner image. We can't activate the sponsorship without it.

upload.title: Upload your banner
upload.subtitle: It will appear on the place page you selected.

dropzone.title: Drag image here or click to select
dropzone.formats: Horizontal format ‚Ä¢ JPG, PNG or WebP

validation.tooSmall: The image is too small (minimum {minWidth}x{minHeight}px). It may appear blurry.
validation.tooTall: The image is too tall. It will appear small with empty space on the sides.
validation.wrongRatio: The aspect ratio ({current}:1) is not ideal. We recommend ~{recommended}:1 (wide horizontal).
validation.canContinue: You can still continue, but the result may not be optimal.

success.title: Image uploaded successfully.
success.saved: We‚Äôve linked the image to your payment. We‚Äôll review it and activate your ad.
success.notSaved: We uploaded the image, but couldn‚Äôt save it. Please contact us with this link.

errors.notPaid: We can‚Äôt upload the image because the payment is not marked as completed.
errors.invalidSession: We couldn‚Äôt verify your payment. Please try again or contact us.
errors.missingFields: Missing information to upload the image. Please try again.
errors.tooLarge: The image exceeds the allowed limit. Please reduce it and try again.
errors.generic: We couldn't upload the image. Please try again.
errors.invalidImage: The file is not a valid image.
